title: 200 """""youths""""" brawl in Melbourne.

embed.description: Posted March 13, 2016 08:41:05 Parts of Melbourne's CBD were shut-down last night as police fought to end a violent street fight between two gangs at Federation Square. Terrified Moomba revellers were forced to take cover as the large street fight erupted between two armed rival groups.

body:
Everyone not brainwashed by liberals should know by now that "youths" is a pretty clear and apparant codeword for minority groups. Sometimes it's used only for very specific minority groups.

Does this happen often in AU or just in Melbourne?

Who are these gangs?
